Attilla/Luzbel::

Luzbel transformed quickly to beast mode and he spat fire increased 
the ring of fire, in that way that the fire grew until it almost 
reach Dragon's head. After that, Luzbel transformed to robot mode and 
grabbed Panzer.

"It's that you idea to get an agreement?" shouted annoyed Luzbel

Attilla felt Darkmouse teeth in his leg and with his tail hit 
DarkMouse.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC: Opps. Let me repost that last one there. *blushes* Eh heh.
> 
> DarkMouse:: She saw Galvatron attack the dragon with the cat in 
it's 
> clutches.  She turned and fired again on the dragon trying to turn 
> her into mouse-crispies. She dodged one fireball,well, almost.  She 
> stopped and sniffed the air. "Something Burning?"  She turned and 
saw 
> the tip of her tail on fire. "YEEEEEEOOOOOOWWWWW!" She started 
> patting her tail trying to smother the fire.  When the fire was 
out, 
> she looked at her tail and a look of pain, remorse and great sorrow 
> crossed her face.  She cried,"Look at my tail. My pretty tail," she 
> cried. She then turned and looked at the dragon with a rage that 
> would have sent it to the pit if her optics had the power. "YOU 
BURNT 
> MY TAIL! PREPARE TO BE DELETED!!!"
> 
> She transformed into mouse mode and springed up towards the dragon 
> and tried to bite at it. Trying to latch on with her long, sharp 
> incisers and sinking them into it's leg. "DIE!!!"
> 
> 
> Panzer::
> She was still off line. 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> >  Galvatron watched as the lizard grabbed her. "Oh hell no." He 
flew 
> off after 
> > the lizard bot. He was much quicker with his advanced tecehnology 
> and flew 
> > over him and stopped infront about 5 feet. He sent a power surge 
> from his 
> > chest and a fire from both his hands. Trying hard not to hit the 
> bot. God 
> > neptune crept behind the lizard attacking Dark Mouse and send  a  
> Grenade 
> > behind his back and it was set to explode about 5 inches from his 
> back.
